spec_data.Name: perl-podlinkcheck
spec_data.Description:
PodLinkCheck parses Perl POD from a script, module or documentation
and checks that L<> links within it refer to a known program, module,
or man page.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 07:00:28 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Check Perl POD L<> link references
